scripts.docker-push: docker tag botchan easychen/botchan:latest && docker push easychen/botchan:latest && TAG=$(date +%Y%m%d%H%M%S) && docker tag botchan easychen/botchan:$TAG && docker push easychen/botchan:$TAG && echo Pushed tag: $TAG
scripts.docker-build-push: docker buildx create --use --name xbd && TAG=$(date +%Y%m%d%H%M%S) && docker buildx build -t easychen/botchan:latest -t easychen/botchan:$TAG --platform=linux/amd64,linux/arm64,linux/arm/v7 --push . && docker buildx rm xbd && echo Pushed tag: $TAG
